about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hi, I'm a frontend developer and UX/UI designer who loves crafting clean, accessible, and user-centric web experiences. My work bridges design and development, with a strong focus on usability, performance, and visual clarity.
about.paragraph2: In recent projects, I've been responsible for both the visual and frontend aspects of product development. I build responsive interfaces using Vue 3 and the Quasar framework, and I've also implemented system email features through Laravel. I specialize in turning design concepts into well-structured, maintainable code that supports a smooth user experience.
about.paragraph3: I've contributed to a range of products, including CRM tools, digital twin platforms, IoT dashboards, and e-commerce websites. These experiences have deepened my understanding of how system logic connects to user behavior, and how thoughtful design can bridge that gap.
about.paragraph4: I'm always eager to explore new tools, design systems, and technologies. I stay up-to-date with the latest trends in UX and frontend development, and I enjoy refining products by identifying user pain points and transforming feedback into meaningful improvements.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic Design
graphicDesign.description: Studied graphic design and became proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).

ucsdVisualArt.title: Visual Arts - Interdisciplinary
ucsdVisualArt.description: Blended art and technology to approach design with creativity and precision.

hunchTech.title: UI/UX Designer
hunchTech.description: Worked on UI/UX design, game interfaces, web creation with Wix, and Firebase integration.

nadiSystem.title: UI/UX Designer
nadiSystem.description: Led smart factory, smart building, and telecom UI projects with Unity, Figma, and data dashboards.

rogersAI.title: UI/UX Designer
rogersAI.description: Designed internal tools and AI interfaces, ran usability testing and prototyped user flows.

woWorld.title: UI/UX & Frontend Developer
woWorld.description: Developed responsive frontend modules and contributed to UI/UX improvements in e-commerce workflows.

invoice.title: Invoice App
invoice.description: In this invoice app, users can create, edit, and delete invoice records. All data is stored in Firebase.

jsModule.title: JS Module
jsModule.description: This project showcases multiple functional modules built with vanilla JavaScript, focusing on DOM manipulation, event handling, and logic flow across UI and data interaction scenarios.

saas.title: SaaS Landing Page
saas.description: A modern SaaS landing page built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring animations, dark mode, and a fully responsive layout.

shop.title: Shopping Website
shop.description: A shopping cart built with JavaScript, featuring a sidebar for editing item quantities, supporting product addition, quantity adjustment, and checkout confirmation.

film.title: Film Explorer
film.description: A responsive movie search site built with the OMDb API, featuring Swiper-based sliders and real-time dynamic search.
